What is the primary objective of the AGMARK certification mark in India?
options: To promote the export of agricultural products
To ensure the quality of agricultural products
To regulate the price of agricultural products
correctAnswer: To ensure the quality of agricultural products

question: Which of the following statements about State Warehousing Corporation is/are correct? (i) Only agricultural commodities notified by the Government are accepted for storage in a warehouse. (ii) The warehousing scheme enables the agriculturists to get a better price for their produce. (iii) The idea behind the whole warehousing scheme is to give scientific storage to the agricultural produce. (iv) A warehouse receipt incorporating the quality, market value and particulars of insurance will be issued to the depositors.
options: Only iii and iv are correct
Only i and ii are correct
Only ii, iii and iv are correct
correctAnswer: Only ii, iii and iv are correct

question: Which of the following statements is/are correct about agricultural seasons of Kerala? (i) There are three main agricultural seasons in Kerala. (ii) Virippu is the first crop season and is from April-May to September-October. (iii) Mundakan season is from December-January to March-April. (iv) Punja season coincides with South West Monsoon.

options: Commission for Agriculture Costs and Prices (CACP)
